attributes.action: delay the need for Energy Performance Certificates for small business sales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To sell a business you now need an EPC (energy performance certificate) the cost of which varies, with quotes of £475.00 for a premises of 54sqm and the price goes up with the size of the building. Small business are struggling already this is another nail in the coffin of SME's. The government should provide grant aid for small business to provide this certificate.
